title: Unspecific error occoured. Please check the logs for more information.
body: I cant seem to update my league it has been like this for a few months i gave up, i then tried to reinstall but not difference has been made please help it stops at 2% or near the end of the update at 70 to 90%

replies.body:
This error is common with the legacy client, and the issue can vary depending on what % it errors.  At 2%, your OS setting might be blocking your game files from being updated but the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should restore access.

At 70 to 90, your network may also be unstable, backtracking and failing to download those updates.  You'll also want to use the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up those blocks as well.  I hope that helps!
None of these has worked for me, what shall i do now?

That's strange it didn't work, but we can dig a bit deeper!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, then attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look with you directly and figure out what's going on.  We'll see you there!
